TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_luhi, title = luhi, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/luhi} }

S.FORM: luhi 苦瓜 luhi sazing kkan nya.qutux ga lalu na ramat.qutux ga luhi ru.
lohi 苦瓜 lohi sazing kkan nya.qotox ga lalo na ramat.qotox ga lohi ro.
